body_html:
@kaspermarstal Thanks for replying, I solve the problem what I submitted, simply add -fPIC flag on the corresponding dependency folder's CMakeCache.txt should be OK, beside zlib, png has the same problem.

so now the question is how to modify the CMakeLists to avoid the error.

so now the question is how to modify the CMakeLists to avoid the error.
